Boise River Basin: Sunny, warm, thin cloud layer comes and goes. Smallest breeze in upper parts of the trees. IB: feather like crystals on interval board, unusual, but likely that large cryastals dropped from the tree branches above and collected on the board. All pine trees had significant feathery crystal gowth on all branches up to a cm in size on the hike in; absolutely beautiful and very delicate.
